user_review_msg: Excellent stay! The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating, the rooms were spacious and clean, and the amenities were top-notch. Highly recommended!
Disappointing experience. The rooms were cramped and outdated, the staff was unhelpful, and the breakfast was subpar. I would not recommend this hotel.
Beautiful hotel with a great location. The views from the rooftop bar were amazing. The staff was professional and helpful, and the room was comfortable and well-equipped.
I had a terrible stay. The hotel was noisy, the room was dirty, and the staff was rude. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

Overall, a pleasant stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly, and the pool was refreshing. The only downside was the noise from the street, which could be bothersome at times.
Amazing hotel! The rooms were luxurious and spacious, the staff was incredibly attentive, and the breakfast was delicious. I would definitely stay here again.
Not recommended. The hotel was overpriced, the rooms were small and cramped, and the service was poor. There are much better options available in the area.
I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The staff was very welcoming and helpful, the room was spacious and clean, and the amenities were excellent. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
I was disappointed with my stay. The hotel was dated, the rooms were cramped, and the staff was not very friendly. I would not return to this hotel.
I was disappointed with my stay. The hotel was dated, the rooms were cramped, and the staff was not very friendly. I would not return to this hotel.
Would not recommend. The hotel was noisy, the rooms were dirty, and the staff was unhelpful. I had a terrible experience and would not stay here again.
Overall, a good stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly, and the breakfast was tasty. The only issue was the lack of parking, which was inconvenient.
Great hotel! The rooms were spacious and well-appointed, the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, and the location was convenient. I would definitely stay here again.
Not impressed. The hotel was overpriced, the rooms were small and cramped, and the staff was not very attentive. I would not recommend this hotel.
I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The rooms were comfortable and clean, the staff was very friendly and helpful, and the amenities were excellent. I would definitely return.
I was disappointed with my stay. The hotel was dated, the rooms were small, and the staff was not very friendly. I would not stay here again.
Fantastic hotel! The rooms were luxurious and spacious, the staff was exceptional, and the location was ideal. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.
Would not recommend. The hotel was noisy, the rooms were dirty, and the staff was unhelpful. I had a terrible experience and would not stay here again.
Overall, a good stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly, and the breakfast was good. However, the internet was slow and unreliable, which was inconvenient.
Great hotel! The rooms were spacious and well-equipped, the staff was incredibly helpful and friendly, and the location was perfect. I would definitely stay here again.
